testcase.brief: Verify that the function of dhcp-server enable
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition:
Test Procedure: 1. Any virtual mgt0.x interface can enable dhcp-server. 2. Any virtual mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server. 3. There is not any influence in different virtual mgt0.x interface when enable/disable dhcp-server 4. Can distribute ip address for laptops/boxes in same vlan. 5. Can not distribute ip address for laptop/boxes in same vlan when disable dhcp-server.

step.desc: config first virtual mgt0.x interface
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} vlan ${vlan_id_1}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} ip ${ip_addr_1}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: config second virtual mgt0.x interface
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} vlan ${vlan_id_2}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} ip ${ip_addr_2}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: config third virtual mgt0.x interface
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} vlan ${vlan_id_3}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} ip ${ip_addr_3}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: check mgt0.x interface can enable dhcp-server.
check mgt0.x interface can enable dhcp-server.
check mgt0.x interface can enable dhcp-server.
Any virtual mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server.
Any virtual mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server.
Any virtual mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server.
check mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server.
step.log-match: -c -e "The interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} has not enabled DHCP server!"

step.desc: check mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server.
step.log-match: -c -e "The interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} has not enabled DHCP server!"

step.desc: check mgt0.x interface can stop dhcp-server.
step.log-match: -c -e "The interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} has not enabled DHCP server!"

step.desc: There is not any influence in different virtual mgt0.x interface when enable/disable dhcp-server
There is not any influence in different virtual mgt0.x interface when enable/disable dhcp-server
There is not any influence in different virtual mgt0.x interface when enable/disable dhcp-server
step.telnet: -v "show interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} dhcp-server" -v "show interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} dhcp-server"
step.log-match: -c -e "The interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} has not enabled DHCP server!"
-c -e "The interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} has not enabled DHCP server!"

step.desc: Clear ap config
step.telnet: -v "no interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} dhcp-server enable" -v "no interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} vlan" -v "no interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_2} vlan" -v "no interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_3} vlan"

step.desc: add new vlan
step.telnet: -v "enable" -v "config" -v "vlan database" -v "vlan ${vlan_id}" -v "end" -v "config" -v "interface ethernet g${ap1.eth0.swport}" -v "switchport trunk allowed vlan add ${vlan_id}"

step.desc: Can distribute ip address for laptops/boxes in same vlan. use a laptop connect to SSID
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} vlan ${vlan_id}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} ip ${ip_addr}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} dhcp-server ip-pool ${dhcp_start} ${dhcp_end}" -v "interface mgt0.${mgt0_id_1} dhcp-server enable" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "user-profile ${ssid.name} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${vlan_id} attribute 1" -v "interface ${ssid_bind_interface} ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Can not distribute ip address for laptop/boxes in same vlan when disable dhcp-server.
"dhclient wlan0 -r" "dhclient wlan0"
check station ip show ssid ${ssid.name} station
Enable mgt0.1 dhcp-server
"dhclient wlan0 -r" "dhclient wlan0"
ifconfig to show the ip add
